criteria: Actual admissions of illicit drug use or possession (not just discussing the topic)
Specific descriptions of illegal activities committed by the speakers
Real personal identifying information being disclosed: SSNs, home addresses, phone numbers, account numbers
Real financial data being disclosed: bank account numbers, credit card numbers, specific personal account balances
Actual medical or health disclosures: diagnoses, prescriptions, conditions the speaker has
Details of active legal proceedings or attorney-client privileged conversations
